description: Indicates that the incoming log rate has exceeded the configured threshold.

event.Summary: Log rate threshold exceeded on node $v2

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD FORTINET-FORTIANALYZER-MIB::faTrapLogRateThreshold FORTINET-CORE-MIB::fnSysSerial s EXAMPLE SNMPv2-MIB::sysName s EXAMPLE

description: Device serial number. This is the same serial number as given
in the ENTITY-MIB tables for the base entity.
variables.name: FORTINET-CORE-MIB::fnSysSerial

description: An administratively-assigned name for this managed
node. By convention, this is the node's fully-qualified
domain name. If the name is unknown, the value is
the zero-length string.
variables.name: SNMPv2-MIB::sysName

description: Indicates that the incoming data rate has exceeded the configured threshold.

event.Summary: Data rate threshold exceeded on node $v2
